item.description: This Irish pub in Mission Hill seems to serve seriously good beer and an interesting menu--lamb burgers, tasty toasties, curry fries...It is located on a side street off of Huntington Avenue, but you can see it from Huntington, basically directly between the Longwood and Brigham Circle stops of the green E train. You can also take the orange to Roxbury Crossing and it's not a bad walk, and I happen to like the coffee shop in that T station, but I digress. It can take a little while to find on-street parking but there are usually some spaces on Huntington or Tremont, a few blocks from Brigham Circle. I will get to the pub by 7:30 and I'll post what I'm wearing on the day of the match (no, I don't plan my outfit nine days out). Match starts at 8.
item.name: play at Squealing Pig
